config.description:
### Known Hosts 
 A comma-separated list of hostnames or IP-addresses of cast devices, use if mDNS discovery is not working.
config.title: Google Cast configuration

confirm.description: Do you want to start set up?

error.invalid_known_hosts: Known hosts must be a comma separated list of hosts.

advanced_options.description:
### Allowed UUIDs
 A comma-separated list of UUIDs of Cast devices to add to Home Assistant. **Use only if you don’t want to add all available cast devices.** 
 ### Ignore CEC 
 A comma-separated list of Chromecasts that should ignore CEC data for determining the active input. This will be will be passed to pychromecast.IGNORE_CEC. [See the upstream documentation for more information](https://github.com/balloob/pychromecast#ignoring-cec-data).
advanced_options.title: Advanced Google Cast configuration

basic_options.description:
### Known Hosts 
 A comma-separated list of hostnames or IP-addresses of cast devices, use if mDNS discovery is not working.
basic_options.title: Google Cast configuration
